io.spine.server.entity

Interface EventFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompositeEventFilter, EventBlackList, EventFieldFilter, EventWhiteList

    @SPI
 @FunctionalInterface
public interface EventFilter
    A filter accepting Events posted by a Repository.

    A filter may allow any event, reject certain types of events, or change the event content.

    API Note:
    This type is a FunctionalInterface, so that an event filter may be defined with a lambda expression.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static EventFilter allowAll()
      Obtains an EventFilter which always returns the input event without any change.
      default com.google.common.collect.ImmutableCollection<io.spine.core.Event> filter(java.util.Collection<io.spine.core.Event> events)
      Applies this filter to the given Events in bulk.
      java.util.Optional<? extends io.spine.base.EventMessage> filter(io.spine.base.EventMessage event)
      Applies this filter to the given event.

    • Method Detail

      • allowAll

        static EventFilter allowAll()
        Obtains an EventFilter which always returns the input event without any change.

        The method acts as if 

             
     static EventFilter allowAll() {
         return Optional::of;
     }
        Returns:
        a filter which allows any event to be published

      • filter

        java.util.Optional<? extends io.spine.base.EventMessage> filter(io.spine.base.EventMessage event)
        Applies this filter to the given event.
        Parameters:
        event - the event to apply the filter to
        Returns:
        processed event or Optional.empty() if the event should not be posted
        API Note:
        This method may never return a present value or return a value not derived from the input event. See the implementations for the details for each case.

      • filter

        default com.google.common.collect.ImmutableCollection<io.spine.core.Event> filter(java.util.Collection<io.spine.core.Event> events)
        Applies this filter to the given Events in bulk.
        Parameters:
        events - the events to apply the filter to
        Returns:
        non-empty filtering results for the given events
        API Note:
        This method should have the same behaviour in any descendant. Override this method only for performance improvement.
